Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 2, 2021

ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08VNR3NRW
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

100 M Water Resistance
Extra Wide Face
LED Backlight (Illuminator) with Afterglow
5 multi-function alarms (with 1 snooze alarm)
1/100 Second Stop-Watch (Measuring Capacity: 23:59’59.99″)
Auto-calendar out until the year 2099, the watch does not have to be adjusted for the number days in month even leap year until 2099

Casio Values

“Necessity is not the mother of invention, invention is the mother of necessity.” These are the words of one of Casio’s founders. The people who created Casio were determined to ‘invent necessity’- to create products that met latent needs with groundbreaking capabilities no one had ever seen before. Ever since, Casio has been doing just that, bringing new discovery and delight to people around the world. This is Casio’s way of building an even more prosperous, richly rewarding world.

Key Features

10 Year Battery

Even with the extra large HD LCD digital display which provides crisp, convenient reads, the built in 10 year battery will provide a decade of use without the worry of changing batteries

100 Meter (330 Feet) Water Resistant

Suitable for everyday use and swimming and snorkeling

Multiple Alarms & Snooze Alarm

5 alarms and a snooze alarm

Stopwatch & Countdown Timer

1/100th Sec. Stopwatch (24Hr)

1/1Sec Countdown Timer (24Hr)

Read more

item.content:encoded:
Price: $42.95 - $31.00
(as of Nov 29,2022 01:28:50 UTC – Details)


If you’re searching for great value in a classic diver-look watch, look no further than the MRW200 from Casio. Its 44. 6mm face and large indexes provide at-a-glance information. Couple this with a bi-directional rotating bezel and 100 meter water resistance and you’ve got a timepiece that’s easy-to-read, simple-to-use and durable. Stainless Steel band analog watch with a black face.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.84 x 1.57 x 0.79 inches; 5.29 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ MRW-200HD-1BVCF
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 7, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ CASIO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B083L9KFB6
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ Japan

Stainless Steel Band, 100-meter water resistance
Resin Case and Resin Bezel, Triple-fold Clasp
Timer Bezel, Resin Glass, Date, day display
Analog: 3 hands (hour, minute, second), Approx. battery life: 3 years on SR626SW

Casio Values

“Necessity is not the mother of invention, invention is the mother of necessity.” These are the words of one of Casio’s founders. The people who created Casio were determined to ‘invent necessity’- to create products that met latent needs with groundbreaking capabilities no one had ever seen before. Ever since, Casio has been doing just that, bringing new discovery and delight to people around the world. This is Casio’s way of building an even more prosperous, richly rewarding world.

Key Features

  • 100-meter water resistance
  • Date, day display
  • Regular timekeeping Analog: 3 hands (hour, minute, second)
